Sentencas: Energy efficiency is one of the main pathways for energy security and environmental protection.
Titulo: Multi-objective design and operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) Triple Combined-cycle Power Generation systems: Integrating energy efficiency and operational safety

Sentencas: In fact, the International Energy Agency asserts that without energy efficiency, 70% of targeted emission reductions are not achievable.
Titulo: Multi-objective design and operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) Triple Combined-cycle Power Generation systems: Integrating energy efficiency and operational safety

Sentencas: Despite this clarity, enhancing the energy efficiency introduce significant challenge toward process operation.
Titulo: Multi-objective design and operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) Triple Combined-cycle Power Generation systems: Integrating energy efficiency and operational safety

Sentencas: The reason is that the methods applied for energy-saving pose the process operation at the intersection of safety constraints.
Titulo: Multi-objective design and operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) Triple Combined-cycle Power Generation systems: Integrating energy efficiency and operational safety

Sentencas: The present research aims at uncovering the trade-off between safe operation and energy efficiency; an optimization framework is developed that ensures process safety and simultaneously optimizes energy-efficiency, quantified in economic terms.
Titulo: Multi-objective design and operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) Triple Combined-cycle Power Generation systems: Integrating energy efficiency and operational safety

Sentencas: The developed optimization framework is demonstrated for a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) power generation system.
Titulo: Multi-objective design and operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) Triple Combined-cycle Power Generation systems: Integrating energy efficiency and operational safety

Sentencas: The significance of this industrial application is that SOFC power plants apply a highly degree of process integration resulting in very narrow operating windows.
Titulo: Multi-objective design and operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) Triple Combined-cycle Power Generation systems: Integrating energy efficiency and operational safety

Sentencas: However, they are subject to significant uncertainties in power demand.
Titulo: Multi-objective design and operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) Triple Combined-cycle Power Generation systems: Integrating energy efficiency and operational safety

Sentencas: The results demonstrate a strong trade-off between the competing objectives.
Titulo: Multi-objective design and operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) Triple Combined-cycle Power Generation systems: Integrating energy efficiency and operational safety

Sentencas: It was observed that highly energy-efficient designs feature a very narrow operating window and limited flexibility.
Titulo: Multi-objective design and operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) Triple Combined-cycle Power Generation systems: Integrating energy efficiency and operational safety

Sentencas: For instance, expanding the safe operating window by 100% will incur almost 47% more annualized costs.
Titulo: Multi-objective design and operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) Triple Combined-cycle Power Generation systems: Integrating energy efficiency and operational safety

Sentencas: Establishing such a trade-off is essential for realizing energy-saving.
